name: Midnight Murders (LaurJam, SoBigMuscles, Soondun, Jotenonsos)
description:
A lone princess...

Her trusty revolver...

And one night to end it all.

'Midnight Murders' is an interactive fiction, where you play as Cinderella as she attempts to finally leave the wild west of Dreamland.

  • Encounter recognizable fairytale characters.
  • Engage them in a quickdraw and see who fires first!
  • AND experience dialogue filled with zesty one-liners!

Controls:

Press Enter to proceed dialogue and to shoot when you hear the bell during quickdraw.

Credits:

Soondun - Programming
SoBigMuscles- 2D Art
Jotenonsos - Writing, Hype-man
LaurJam - Audio, Programming
